Sorry this feature work on Lollipop(Android 5.0) or higher version only. For lower version you can use below steps to take screenshot.
1.To take a screenshot, just press and hold the \'Volume Down\' and \'Power\' buttons at the same time for 2 seconds.
2.If that doesn\'t work(or you have Samsung device), just press and hold the \'Home\' and \'Power\' buttons at the same time for 2 seconds.
